import React from 'react'; import "./post.css"; import {MoreVert} from "@material-ui/icons"; import {Users} from "../../randomData"; function Post({post}) { return (
u.id === post.userId)[0].profilePicture} alt="" className="postProfileImage" /> {Users.filter((u) => u.id === post.userId)[0].username} {post.date}
{post?.description}
{post.like} people like it
{post.comment} comments
) } export default Post
